segments.text: Welcome back ! How was your vacation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was fantastic , but I'm glad to be back ! Being a tourist is really tiring !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where did you end up going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because it's off-season , we got a really good package deal to Paris , so we went there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've always wanted to go to Paris . The Eiffel Tower is one of the most famous tourist attractions in the world ! Did you go to the top ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That was the first thing we did . I have a few pictures . Do you want to see them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . What's this one a picture of ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's a picture of me on our fourth day of travelling . I'm standing next to a famous foundation in the centre of the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't look very happy in that picture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , by that time , I was sick of sightseeing . I had had enough of art galleries , cathedrals , fountains , statues , and palaces !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We spent that afternoon walking around a flea market . We had a few coffees , watched a movie , and went for a swim in the pool at the hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My travel agent always reminds me to plan a day of relaxing for every 3 days of sightseeing . Did you go to the Louvre ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course ! You can't go to Paris without going to their famous art gallery ! I was surprised by how small the Mona Lisa was though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's what everyone says ! I can't wait to see it for myself some day .
segments.speaker: S1
